name: Minimum and Maximum Quantity for WooCommerce
author: theDotstore

sections.description:
It allows you to define the minimum and maximum allowable product quantities per product, category and country.

You can set min and max checkout for order quantity, order value and order item.

Plugin Demo : View Demo

💁 KEY FEATURES:

  • Easy to create quantity rules for orders, products, category, country.
  • Enable/disable add to cart quantity validation and correction.
  • Set the product default quantity for all your store products.
  • Manage Minimum and Maximum Quantity Rules
  • Clone Minimum and Maximum Quantity Rules

👉 PRODUCTS QUANTITY

  • Set minimum product order quantities (cart total minimum quantity or per item minimum quantity).
  • Set maximum product order quantities (cart total maximum quantity or per item maximum quantity).

👉 VARIABLE PRODUCT QUANTITY

  • Set minimum variable product order quantities (cart total minimum quantity or per item minimum quantity).
  • Set maximum variable product order quantities (cart total maximum quantity or per item maximum quantity).

👉 CATEGORY QUANTITY

  • Set minimum category order quantities (cart total minimum quantity or per item minimum quantity).
  • Set maximum category order quantities (cart total maximum quantity or per item maximum quantity).

👉 COUNTRY QUANTITY

  • Set minimum country order quantities (cart total minimum quantity or per item minimum quantity).
  • Set maximum country order quantities (cart total maximum quantity or per item maximum quantity).

👉 Checkout: Order Quantity

  • Set a minimum order quantity required to checkout.
  • Set a maximum order quantity required to checkout.
  • Set custom message for Min order quantity not reached and Max order quantity exceeded message

👉 Checkout: Order Value

  • Set a minimum order value required to checkout.
  • Set a maximum order value required to checkout.
  • Set custom message for Min order value not reached and Max order value exceeded message

👉 Checkout: Order Item

  • Set a minimum order item required to checkout.
  • Set a maximum order item required to checkout.
  • Set custom message for Min order item not reached and Max order item exceeded message

💁 Contact Us

  • Free plugin: Need Technical Help? – Click here
  • Pro Plugin: PRE-SALE Query – Click here

sections.installation:
• Download the plugin
  • Upload minimum-and-maximum-quantity-for-woocommerce to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  • Activate and enjoy!
sections.faq:
Q. Can I set only Min quantity?

Ans: Yes you can set only minimum product quantity on a global level

Q. Can I set the Min/Max quantity limit from the category?

Ans: Yes, you can set min and max quantity limit for the category

Q. What type of quantity-based restriction rules can I create with the plugin?

Ans: You can set minimum and maximum quantity rules on orders, products, categories, and country.

Q. Can I set a custom message to inform the customer for don’t fulfill the rules on the cart page?

Ans: Yes, you can add a custom message on the cart page from the Manage Message section from the plugin.

Q. Does the plugin allow to create an unlimited rule for quantity restrictions for the product?

Ans: Yes, you can create unlimited rules for product quantity, order quantity, category quantity and many more

Q. Does Min/Max Quantities work with Composite Products?

Ans: Not at this time. Composite products are not recognized, so min/max rules are ignored.

Q. Can Min/Max Quantities be translated?

Ans: Yes, a POT file is included.
sections.changelog:
1.1.2

  • [Enhancement] – Compatible with WooCommerce 8.7.x
  • [Enhancement] – Compatible with WordPress 6.5.x

1.1.1

  • [Bug Fix] – Minor fixes related to the rules listing page information
  • [Bug Fix] – Minor fixes related to the category specific min/max rule
  • [Bug Fix] – Minor fixes related to the compatibility issue with the Salient theme
  • [Enhancement] – Quick fix related to the Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability
  • [Enhancement] – Compatible with WooCommerce 7.9.x
  • [Enhancement] – Compatible with WordPress 6.2.x

1.1.0

  • Enhancement – Implemented a new conditional workflow of min/max rules
  • Enhancement – Ability to search products by SKU
  • Enhancement – Ability to change rule status from listing page
  • Enhancement – Plugin compatibility with PHP 8.1.x
  • Enhancement – UI enhancement
  • Enhancement – Integrated plugin with Freemius
  • Update – Compatible with WordPress Version 6.1.x
  • Update – Compatible with WooCommerce version 7.5.x

1.0.8

  • Fixed – Plugin text translation issue
  • Update – Compatible with WordPress Version 6.0.x
  • Update – Compatible with WooCommerce version 7.0.x

1.0.7

  • Enhancement – Improvise Plugin layout and design
  • Enhancement – Allowed float numbers in Min/Max Order Value fields
  • Fixed – Minor bug fixed related to the checkout message
  • Update – Compatible with WordPress Version 6.0.x
  • Update – Compatible with WooCommerce version 6.7.x

1.0.6

  • Fixed – Minor bug fixed related to null value not allowed on max quantity field
  • Update – Fully compatible with Loco Translate Plugin
  • Update – Compatible with WordPress Version 5.8.x
  • Update – Compatible with WooCommerce version 5.8.x

1.0.5

  • Enhancement – UI enhancement
  • Fixed – Once Min and Max’s quantity is the same then hiding quantity textbox
  • Update – Compatible with WordPress Version 5.8.x
  • Update – Compatible with WooCommerce version 5.6.x

1.0.4

  • Fixed – Unable to add maximum 1 quantity
  • Compatible with WordPress Version 5.7.x
  • Compatible with WooCommerce version 5.3.x

1.0.3

  • Compatible with WordPress Version 5.6.x
  • Compatible with WooCommerce version 4.9.x

1.0.2 – 28.12.2020

  • Compatible with WordPress Version 5.6.x
  • Compatible with WooCommerce version 4.8.x

1.0.1 – 28.09.2020

  • Compatible with WordPress Version 5.5.x
  • Compatible with WooCommerce version 4.5.x

1.0.0

  • First release!
sections.reviews:
Works Wonderfully!

By zahir75 on January 4, 2024

This plugin works beautifully and easy to configure. Highly recommended!

Very good!

By dockalle on September 11, 2023

Works very well, I like it!

A bug Appears

By atelsheikh on March 21, 2023

Hello,

The plugin works fine when adding to basket , but after this while you reviewing your basket you can increase quantities normally, Big issue !!

My first impression is successful

By ornibacom on February 22, 2023

I just started using the plugin. My first impression is successful. The rules structure is useful.

OK as a free plugin, but hard to use

By (jonthewebb) on October 17, 2022

It has worked OK but it's a bit hard to use, rules pages are not obvious. We have uninstalled this plugin and paid for another instead which allows rules to be applied from product pages.

Nonfunctional after update

By samwisee on June 2, 2022

After working marvelously for quite some time, the entire plugin has inexplicably stopped working entirely on version 1.0.6. Our business requires a maximum quantity per item for an entire product category, and customers are able to add items from this category to their cart over the specified limit. Thus, useless. Additionally, this plugin isn't even represented in any way on the dotstore webpage, with no documentation or forums available to see if this is occurring for other users. I assume that support for this plugin has been discontinued. What a disappointment. Brief edit: it is worth noting that we are using Wordpress 6, which may be causing the issue. In summary, if you want this plugin to work, hold off on updating WP.

No Longer Works!

By qabd on May 12, 2022

This plugin no longer works. No messages are displayed!

No mesage, not friendly with user

By fcipolla on August 12, 2021

The Plugin do not use the massage that you apply in settings, Show a non sense note that "some thing is wrong in your Cart" and show a link to go to Cart. Do not make any sense. And the costumer keeps with do not knowing what to do. I use Elementor and Hello theme, but test with 2021 Theme with the same result.

LOVE THIS PLUGIN!

By robyn.graham on July 24, 2021

Works great!

Very nice. No bugs.

By Zambu (thomasw98) on April 7, 2021

Very nice simple plugin. Works great. Things I don't like: Hate how it adds its own little menu to the admin menu. They really should just follow the standard practice of having it in the Settings menu. The standard warning messages that they have pre-installed have non-fluent English grammar. They really should improve this. Things I wish they had: Wish the warning text could include HTML, e.g. so that it could be bold and red so users don't overlook it. Five Stars!

short_description: Allow you to set a minimum or maximum purchase quantity for the WooCommerce store.
